data.title: Me and the Devil by Gil Scott-Heron
data.meta_description: Me and the Devil by Gil Scott-Heron was written by Robert Johnson and was first recorded and released by Robert Johnson in 1938. Gil Scott-Heron released it on the album I'm New Here in 2010. It was covered by Eric Gales, Norris Johnson, The Juke Jumpers with Jim Colegrove, Helander Blues Co., Dafne and other artists.
data.text:
